text: Three years have passed since Miranda Lambert and Blake Shelton divorced, but the superstar of country music is always mending the pieces of his broken heart. In the second part of her interview with Holly Gleason of HITS Daily Double, which was published on Tuesday, Lambert reveals why she avoided the press leading up to her 2016 album, The Weight of These Wings. Lambert detailed his separation from Shelton in the deeply personal project, which went platinum and won the album of the year at the awards of ACM 2017.
